    • Uses of AudioStream in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.audio

      Subclasses of AudioStream in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.audio 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ByteArrayAudioStream
      This is an implementation of a FixedLengthAudioStream, which is based on a simple byte array.
      class  FileAudioStream
      This is an AudioStream from an audio file
      class  FixedLengthAudioStream
      This is an AudioStream, which can provide information about its absolute length and is able to provide cloned streams.
      class  URLAudioStream
      This is an AudioStream from an URL.

      Plays the passed audio stream on the given sink.
      void AudioSink.process(@Nullable AudioStream audioStream)
      Processes the passed AudioStream If the passed AudioStream is not supported by this instance, an UnsupportedAudioStreamException is thrown.
      String AudioHTTPServer.serve(AudioStream stream)
      Creates a relative url for a given AudioStream where it can be requested a single time.
